criteria.title:
Dear Evaluator,
You are to check only requirements listed in the assignment.
If any issue is not covered by assignment requirements, then neither should you check it nore evaluate.

All doubts are interpreted in favor of the student.
If you have doubts, whether or not to deduct points, do not deduct.

criteria.text: Readme.md has instruction how to run application
user-defined bridge is created and configured
application is restarting upon changes implemented into src folder
database files and logs to be stored in volumes instead of container
Final size of the Docker image with application is less than 500 MB
Implemented npm script for vulnerabilities scanning (free solution)
Your built image is pushed to DockerHub
In case specific image is not used (it is required to use images like postgres and node, but not ubuntu with installation of node or postgres)
Postgres container is not configured as dependency for application container
Commits after deadline (except commits that affect only 'Readme.md', '.gitignore', etc.). Penalty is -30% of total task score
